item.description:
Join us for Monday Morning BUZZ Zumba!

Kick your week off right with FUN and FITNESS with Zumba Dance with Amy!

Mondays 8:30am – 9:30am
Latitude's Andover, MA

OPEN TO THE PUBLIC!


We have new people every week, NO EXPERIENCE NECESSARY so come TRY IT and get hooked!

Open to members or to the public for a Drop-In Rate. PLEASE CONTACT SPECIFIC LOCATION FOR DAY PASS INFO and use your Tufts Health Insurance card for discounts!

For more details: www.zumbadancewithamy.com

group.name: The Zumba Dance and Fitness Meetup Group

item.name: Monday Morning BUZZ Zumba!
